content: कार्षापणः, --णं (or --पणकः) A coin or weight of different values; <ls>Ms. 8. 136</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">336</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 282.</ls> (= कर्ष). --णं Money.
